name: Inner Demons (LD47)
description:
Semi experimental strategy game about fighting ones inner demons and escaping vicious cycles of self loathing.  Inner Demons attempts to explore ideas such as consumerism as a device to combat or hide from negative thoughts. 

The game is played with a mouse. Drag items down to the large box below them to snap them to a grid in this item management & deck building inspired entry.  Drag them back out of the inventory onto your demons to gain a 1 off effect, or keep them in your possession to gain an advantage over time.  To stop the aggressively snowballing demon attack damage, build up the perfect combination of goods to survive the onslaught and achieve total victory.
